events.message: I reported an accident that occurred yesterday when my car was rear-ended at a stoplight.
The claim has been classified under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle details.
An agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will contact you shortly.
We have formally acknowledged your claim submission and started the processing of your auto accident case.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle and a copy of the police accident report to proceed.
The requested documents including the police report and photos of the damage have been uploaded successfully.
Our investigation into the details of the collision and liability is now underway.
The investigation has concluded with all liability and damage assessments finalized.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the damage evaluation and submitted for your approval.
We have received your feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement terms.
Your claim has been formally approved and the settlement amount has been confirmed.
The payment for your approved auto accident claim has been issued to your bank account.
Your claim is now closed following the successful settlement and payment issuance.
All records related to your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
